newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: AUSTRALIA GOVT AWARDS A$55.5 MLN BUILDING CONTRACT.
newsitem.headline: AUSTRALIA GOVT AWARDS A$55.5 MLN BUILDING CONTRACT.

text.p: The Australian government on Tuesday awarded a A$55.5 million refurbishment contract to Lend Lease Interiors, a unit of Lend Lease Corp.
Administrative Services Minister David Jull said Lend Lease was chosen from six tenderers to refurbish the historic Administrative Building in Canberra.
"The project will create work for up to 200 construction workers during its 16-month life," Jull said in a statement.
He said the project should be completed by late November 1998 when the Finance Department would take over about 40 percent of the building. -- Canberra Bureau 61-6 273-2730
